title: Cat. 94  Centerpiece, 1952
publication_title: American Silver in the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">Tiffany & Co. (American, founded 1837)  
New York, New York  
Silver; 11.4 × 42 × 20.7 cm (4 1/2 × 16 1/2 × 8 1/8 in.)  
The Art Institute of Chicago, restricted gift of the Antiquarian Society through the Mr. and Mrs. Morris Weeden Fund, 1987.183

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section curatorial_entry" id="curatorial_entry">On bottom (fig. 94.1)

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section provenance" id="provenance">With Lillian Nassau, New York, by 1987.

Sold to the Art Institute, 1987.

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section references" id="references">Tiffany (1952), p. 19 (ill.).

Tiffany (1952?), p. 20 (ill.).

</section><section id="figures">Centerpiece, 1952.

fig. 94.1 </section>
